instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2850 really low output on headphones
threads.message:
Just replaced SMC and U7000 and the MacBook now works fine except the audio output on headphones is really low.
Anyone seen this before?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2850 really low output on headphones
threads.message: Headphone comes straight out of the codec U6201. Measure on diode mode both left and right outputs and compare to good one.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2850 really low output on headphones
threads.message: There where a couple of ripped caps above U6201, replaced U6201 and added the caps. All good now, thank you.
